1.0.name: wordpress/my-kindle-books
1.0.description:
If you are anything like me you'd love to see the books that your favourite bloggers are reading, that's why I built this plugin that hopefully they'll all use.

The reward for sharing your books is money, just add your Amazon affiliate tags, and make money everytime a user clicks on one of your books, and then buys it from the Amazon store.

After installing My Kindle Books, simple go to it's admin page to add your books. This is done by simply connecting your kindle, then browsing it's documents folder that contains all the books on your Kindle, then selecting your favourite books.

Once your books have been selected we then take the ISBN numbers from your selected books and send them to our central server, we then get the title, author and cover images for each of your books.

This information is then displayed on the admin page and you can move the order of your books by dragging them, or remove them from the list by clicking the delete button.
